text:
Today we're learning English with one of the 
most fascinating stories within the world of

Harry Potter, that of Severus Snape. So if you're 
a Harry Potter fan this will surely bring some

nostalgia for you, and even if you're not, this 
is going to be a great opportunity to learn tons

of vocabulary, expressions and more.
So let's apparate into the magical

world of Harry Potter.
This is indeed a pivotal

scene in the Harry Potter franchise, where you 
learn a great deal more about Snape's backstory.

And by the way, if this is your first 
time to Learn English TV Series,

I want to let you know that every single week 
we make fun lessons with your favorite movies,

series and more, so that you can understand 
fast speaking natives without getting lost,

without missing the jokes and without subtitles.
Just like our fan Stéphane, who says that she

never gets bored with our lessons and is 
making clear progress with her English.

And you will too, it's really simple: just hit 
the Subscribe button and the Bell down below,

and you can join over 3 million learners 
around the world, having fun learning English.

Hey, do you want to learn the 
vocabulary that natives really use?

Well, with our Fluent with Friends Course 
you can learn hundreds of the words and

expressions that you need to be able to 
speak English fluently and confidently.

And it's so much fun it'll almost be like magic, 
so you can try that absolutely FREE with our

3-Part Masterclass. Just click up here or down 
description below to learn more and sign up!

Hey, are you a fan of Harry Potter? Well 
we have plenty more lessons like this one!

You can find them in this playlist by clicking 
up here or down the description below.
